resources.string: A purchased subscription is no longer required unless you are using the Cadpage paging service. But you can purchase one if you just want to support us.
You have earned free, lifetime access to Cadpage. Thank you for you contributions.
You have free access to Cadpage as a member of\n %s\n Thank you for your support
Your %1$s Cadpage subscription will renew automatically on\n%2$s
You have a %1$s Cadpage subscription that is good until\n%2$s

You are using a service sponsored by\n%1$s until %2$s.\n Support for Cadpage development and maintenance is provided by this sponsor. No further payment is expected from you as long as you are using services provided by this sponsor.

You are using a service sponsored by\n%s\n Support for Cadpage development and maintenance is provided by this sponsor. No further payment is expected from you as long as you are using services provided by this sponsor.
Your %1$s subscription will expire in %2$d days
Your %1$s Cadpage subscription will expire on %2$s.
You are using a service sponsored by %1$s that will expire on %2$s. Please contact %1$s about renewing their Cadpage sponsorship.

You are using a service sponsored by %1$s that expired on %2$s. You can continue to use Cadpage as long as you do not install a release published after that date. Please contact %1$s about renewing their Cadpage sponsorship.
Your using a service sponsored by %1$s that expired on %2$s. Please contact %1$s about renewing their Cadpage sponsorship.
You have been using Cadpage for %1$d days. You have %2$d days left before the demo expires.
You have been using Cadpage for %1$d days. Your Cadpage demo expired %2$d days ago.

You have upgraded to a version of Cadpage that treats your email accounts as private user information, which we will not access without your explicit permission. You have a payment status which we may not be able to confirm without that email account information.\n\n
You are strongly advised to allow Cadpage to access your account information now. If you do not, we may lose track of your payment subscription status later.
Allow Cadpage to access my account information

You have requested an operation that we cannot perform without accessing your email account information. This is considered private user information which we are not permitted to access without your explicit permission.\n\n
The email account information may be included in emails sent to Cadpage support and used to update your payment status. It will also be used to query your payment status on our servers.

Your current billing account is %s.


This account information is considered private user information which Cadpage cannot use without your explicit permission. For the most part, Cadpage will work just fine without it. It is only required if you are requesting a free Cadpage subscription or reporting some kind of billing problem.


The account information may be included in emails sent to Cadpage support and used to update your payment status. It will also be used to query your payment status on our servers.
Do not access billing account information

Our sincere apologies. Please click the button below to generate an email. It helps if the email includes your full name somewhere so we can use it to look you up in our payment records. We will do our best to get this fixed.
No problem. Our policy is to issue full refunds for anyone requesting them within 3 months. Clicking the button below will send us an email requesting your purchase refund.

You have not received an alert from %s for more than 60 days, leading us to believe that your account with them is no longer active. If we are wrong about this, use the "Send Us an Email" button to contact us and we will get this fixed.
Your existing subscription expires on %1$s. And if you renew your Cadpage subscription now it will expire in one year and you will loose %2$d days of subscription service.
I will purchase a subscription later
The Google Play Store app reports that in-app purchases are not supported. You may need to upgrade the Play Store app to the latest version. Or you may need to give it a valid Google account.
Aptoide Store payments are not currently working.

Sorry, that is not a recognized Cadpage authorization code

 If you have an activation code for CodeMessaging or Active911, this is not the right place for them. Go back to Cadpage Settings and select
 Direct Paging Vendors > (approriate vendor) > Register
 and follow the directions
I cannot make Google Play payments
Bummer, let\'s see what we can do about that.
"Tell us briefly why you cannot afford a $9.99 per year payment."
This will restart your 30 day demo period. But it will also erase all app data, including your call history and settings. Are you sure you want to do this?
You are exempt from any demo or subscription limits until the next Cadpage version update which must be done in the next %d days.

You are using a location in New Zealand.\n We are not charging New Zealand users at this time. Partly because non-US location support is still experimental and partly because we want encourage more users to try it there. We may change this at some later time if/when Cadpage becomes well established there.

You are using a location in Sweden.\n We are not charging Swedish users at this time. Partly because non-US location support is still experimental and partly because we want encourage more users to try it there. We may change this at some later time if/when Cadpage becomes well established there.

You are using a location in the United Kingdom.\n We are not charging UK users at this time. Partly because non-US location support is still experimental and partly because we want encourage more users to try it there. We may change this at some later time if/when Cadpage becomes well established there.

You are using a location in the Australia.\n We are not charging Australian users at this time. Partly because non-US location support is still experimental and partly because we want encourage more users to try it there. We may change this at some later time if/when Cadpage becomes well established there.

You are using a location sponsored by Cadpage.\n Cadpage sponsors the general locations because their performance is unreliable and we do not want to charge users who are waiting until a better location can be implemented.

Cadpage will not do anything with your current default settings. You need to go into the Location Settings and either select a location corresponding to your area or set the From: (filter) to the email address or phone number that sends you your text pages.

The information in this alert was not provided by Cadpage. This alert was processed with a new parsing system that Active911 is setting up to replace the Cadpage parsing system. We are working with Active911 to restore Cadpage parsing services.
You appear to be getting text pages from %s. You can register to get direct pages from them, which don\'t rely on text messaging, eliminating several problems associated with text messages.

Direct paging allows message servicing agencies to push pages to Cadpage directly through the data networks, without relying on text paging. Which eliminates both the text message fees and the length limits carriers impose on text messages. And most agencies pay Cadpage out of the money they get from departments and dispatch centers, so we don\'t expect direct paging users to purchase a Cadpage subscription.
Leave things the way they are
Your %1$s subscription will expire in %2$d days
Your %1$s Cadpage subscription will expire on %2$s. The Cadpage Paging service subscription has no grace period. Pages will stop being forwarded as soon as your subscription expires.

You are using a service sponsored by %1$s that will expire on %2$s. Please contact %1$s about renewing their Cadpage sponsorship. The Cadpage Paging service subscirption has no grace period. Pages will stop being forwarded as soon as your subscription expires.
Your %1$s Cadpage subscription expired on %2$s. Cadpage Paging Service is suspended.
Your using a service sponsored by %1$s that expired on %2$s. Cadpage Paging Service is suspended. Please contact %1$s about renewing their Cadpage sponsorship.
No Cadpage Parser is available for this alert
Cadpage does not currently include a message parser that can handle this alert. Please use the "Report Problem button below to report this so we can get it fixed.
We need to hear from you!!!

We are considering dropping Cadpage support for some very old versions of Android. Your device is currently running one of these old versions, and we need to hear from you want us to continue supporting Cadpage on your device.
This alert was processed by a generic location parser. Please use the "Report Problem button below to report this so we can set up a better location specific parser for you.
Paging service requires a paid subscription
Cadpage paging service is only available to users with current paid subscriptions. We have to pay to support each user on this service, we can not afford give it away.

You are registered to receive direct pages from Cadpage Paging Services.

 Your dispatch email address is
 %s

 Any email sent to this address will be appear as a Cadpage dispatch alert.
Please send my dispatch alerts to %s
Are you sure you want to do this?\n Once you reset the current dispatch address, it will be necessary to have your department send all dispatch alerts to the new dispatch address.
Cadpage assists emergency first responders in getting dispatched to an emergency scene.
Cadpage will not do anything with your current settings.

%s\n\n Cadpage only works if you belong to a fire department or other emergency response organization that is sending alerts to this device when a call is dispatched. Alerts can be sent as text messages, or if your department uses CodeMessaging or Active911 as a message service, as direct pages.
My department sends me text alerts

You need to tell Cadpage something about where you are so that it knows how to interpret the alerts you are receiving. Usually, this is just a matter of selecting the location where your dispatch center is located.
My current location is not supported

OK, we are going to have to ask our developer for help with this, and he is going to need to see some examples of what your text alerts look like. Choosing to email the developer immediately after Cadpage fails to pick up an alert is the best way to get this information to him.
Location is selected, but Cadpage is still not working
You need to register Cadpage with the Active911 service. To do this, you will need your Active911 device activation code which you can get from your department.

You need to register Cadpage with the CodeMessaging service. The process is pretty much self-explanatory. The only tricky part is that you have to answer "YES" when you are asked if you are receiving CodeMessaging alerts.

Cadpage will not do anything for you if you are not receiving dispatch alerts. If you are part of an emergency response organization, talk to your department and see if they can send you the department's dispatch alerts.


If you are not part of an emergency response organization, Cadpage will not be useful to you.


If you have any questions or suggestions as to how Cadpage might be more useful, feel free to use the "Email the Developer" setting to contact us.
Hopefully, Cadpage will start working properly. If you still have problems, use the \"Email the Developer\" setting to contact the developer for assistance.
Cadpage text message processing is currently disabled. You may have to grant Cadpage permission to access text messages before enabling this.

OK. Once you register with this service it will assign you a dispatch email address. You need to have your dispatch alerts sent to this email address. From there they will be forwarded to Cadpage. A paid subscription will be required, but you should get a free 30 demo rate to try it out.
Text alert support is going away

Due to Google Play restrictions, support for processing text alerts will soon disappear. If you need this capability you will either need to switch to the Cadpage Paging service or install a version of Cadpage from somewhere other than the Google Play Store

Due to Google Play restrictions, alerts for text dispatch messages are no longer supported. If you need this capability you will either need to switch to the Cadpage Paging service or install a version of Cadpage from somewhere other than the Google Play Store
Any version of Cadpage you find somewhere other than Google Play Store will work. Since this version was installed from the Play Store, it is not allowed to be more specific. Seek and ye shall find.
I do not require Cadpage text message support

When you respond to an Active911 alert, Cadpage can report your current real time location so it can be displayed on the Active911 map display. Enabling this feature will require changing your location tracking permissions.
Active911 real time location tracking requires precise location permission
For this to work properly, you must allow location access all of the time.
Cadpage will collect location data to support this feature even when Cadpage is closed or not visible. Location data will never be collected for longer than 20 min after the alert is received.
As of Android 10, the Cadpage show alarm popup window option requires that the \"Pop on screen\" option be enabled for the regular dispatch notification category
Disable Cadpage show alarm popup option
Cadpage is configured to generate alert notifications, but system app notifications are disabled
Full screen notifications are not enabled
Full screen notifications must be enabled to support Cadpage popup alerts.
We have found Cadpage works much better if you disable battery optimization. This will have little or no effect on actual battery consumption
Starting with Android 12, Cadpage just will not work unless you disable battery optimization. This will have little or no effect on actual battery consumption
Disable Battery Optimization for Support App
Cadpage cannot initiate phone calls unless battery optimization is disabled for support app
Turn off Cadpage support battery optimization
